movies.title: Whispers Behind the Wall
movies.plot: Martin leaves his protective parents' home and comes to Berlin as a law student with high hopes. He finds a tiny, run-down flat in a strange, dark apartment block, from which the previous tenant has disappeared without a trace. Having no luck with social contacts at the university, Martin quickly falls for his mysterious landlady Simone, who lives just next door behind a thin wall. Hoping to find trust and intimacy, Martin loses himself in the house's disturbing world of sex and violence. Deep in the walls, Martin discovers the true horror of his first love.
movies.simplePlot: Shy law student Martin falls for his mysterious landlady, who lives next door behind a thin wall. While trying to find out if she's responsible for the disappearance of the previous tenant, Martin experiences the horror of his first love.

biography.bio: Vincent Redetzki was born on April 1, 1992 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Un été à Berlin (2005), Nocebo (2014) and Whispers Behind the Wall (2013).
biography.name: Vincent Redetzki

biography.bio: Katharina Heyer was born on April 25, 1983 in Ellwangen/Jagst, Germany. She is an actress, known for Whispers Behind the Wall (2013), Secret meurtrier (2011) and Früher oder später (2007).
biography.name: Katharina Heyer

biography.bio: Florian Panzner was born on July 20, 1976 in Bielefeld, Germany. He is an actor, known for Valkyrie (2008), Die letzte Spur (2012) and Conspiracy (2001).
biography.name: Florian Panzner

biography.bio: Niels Bormann was born on April 28, 1973 in Bremen, Germany. He is an actor, known for Toni Erdmann (2016), bestefreunde (2014) and Erzébet (2006).
biography.name: Niels Bormann

biography.bio: Nikolai Kinski was born on July 30, 1976 in Paris, France as Nanhoï Nikolai Kinski. He is an actor, known for Æon Flux (2005), Point Break (2015) and Tortilla Soup (2001).
biography.name: Nikolai Kinski

biography.bio: Ronald Nitschke was born on August 10, 1950 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Shining Through (1992), Faraway, So Close! (1993) and L'innocent (1993).
biography.name: Ronald Nitschke

biography.bio: Robert Stadlober was born on August 3, 1982 in Friesach, Carinthia, Austria. He is an actor, known for Summer Storm (2004), Crazy (2000) and Enemy at the Gates (2001).
biography.name: Robert Stadlober

biography.bio: Leszek Stalewski is an actor, known for Whispers Behind the Wall (2013).
biography.name: Leszek Stalewski

biography.bio: Petra Zieser was born on December 23, 1957 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany. She is an actress, known for The Edukators (2004), Illumination garantie (1999) and Knallharte Jungs (2002).
biography.name: Petra Zieser

biography.bio: Almut Zilcher is an actress, known for Les vivants (2012), Welcome to the Club (2014) and Tödliches Leben (1995). She was previously married to Dimiter Gotscheff.
biography.name: Almut Zilcher

biography.bio: Hanns Zischler was born on June 18, 1947 in Nuremberg, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Munich (2005), Sils Maria (2014) and Ripley's Game (2002).
biography.name: Hanns Zischler

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Nominated German Independence Award - Best German Film
